title: Ukraine war a violation of international law - UN chief
content: This video can not be playedAnt√≥nio Guterres condemned the war in Ukraine at a special meeting of the General Assembly nearly one year after Russia invaded the country.Read more about the speech, where he called the invasion an "affront" to the world's collective conscience,here <https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-64739975>.
